words.source: H7971 (שׁלח), HC/Vqq1cs (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-1cs, sequential future). KJV 'And I will stretch out', ESV 'So I will stretch out', NASB 'So I will stretch out'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo (direct object marker). Untranslated in English.
H3027 (יָד), HNcbsc/Sp1cs (noun-common-both-singular-construct/suffix-1cs). KJV 'my hand', ESV 'my hand', NASB 'My hand'.
H5221 (נכה), HC/Vhq1cs (conjunctive/Hiphil-perfect-1cs, sequential future). KJV 'and smite', ESV 'and strike', NASB 'and strike'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo (direct object marker). Untranslated in English.
H4713 (מִצְרַיִם), HNp (proper noun). KJV 'Egypt', ESV 'Egypt', NASB 'Egypt'.
H3605 (כֹּל), HR/Ncmsc (preposition-beth/noun-common-ms-construct). KJV 'with all', ESV 'with all', NASB 'with all'.
H6381 (פלא), HVNrfpc/Sp1cs (Niphal-participle-fp-construct/suffix-1cs). KJV 'my wonders', ESV 'the wonders', NASB 'My wonders'.
H834 (אֲשֶׁר), HTr (relative particle). KJV 'which', ESV 'that', NASB 'which'.
H6213 (עשׂה), HVqi1cs (Qal-imperfect-1cs). KJV 'I will do', ESV 'I will do', NASB 'I shall do'.
H7130 (קֶרֶב), HR/Ncmsc/Sp3ms (preposition-beth/noun-common-ms-construct/suffix-3ms). KJV 'in the midst thereof', ESV 'in it', NASB 'in the midst of it'.
H310 (אַחַר), HC/R (conjunctive/preposition). KJV 'and after', ESV 'After', NASB 'and after'.
H3651 (כֵּן), HD (adverb). KJV 'after that', ESV 'after that', NASB 'after that'.
H7971 (שׁלח), HVpi3ms (Piel-imperfect-3ms). KJV 'he will let you go', ESV 'he will let you go', NASB 'he will let you go'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo/Sp2mp (direct object marker/suffix-2mp). KJV 'you', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'.
